When I was CA’s Attorney General, we had to fight tooth and nail to get relief for struggling families who were put in impossible financial positions by the foreclosure crisis, predatory for-profit colleges, payday lenders, the list goes on.

As former Attorney General of California, I know how critical the CFPB is to protecting consumers. What Trump is doing is flat out wrong. We must protect the CFPB. 
https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2017-11-27/next-act-in-cfpb-drama-comes-when-dueling-bosses-show-up-to-lead
